resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103618</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103618</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Visual Messages: Creating a Photomontage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtmeldungen: Erstellen von von einem 
Photomontage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Messages Visuels : Créer un Photomontage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mensagens Visuais: Criando um Photomontage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Messaggi Visivi: Creazione del Photomontage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτικά μηνύματα: Δημιουργία ενός Photomontage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mensajes Visuales: Crear un Photomontage</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">uses essays and photos provided by Peace Corps Volunteers to help students create a photomontage that focuses attention on environmental issues in the United States and Africa. Students challenge themselves to ask the question, What is the photograph communicating?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebrauchversuche und -fotos stellten vom 
Friedenskorpse zur Verfügung, das Freiwilliger zu den Hilfe 
Kursteilnehmern ein photomontage erstellen, das Aufmerksamkeit auf 
Klimaausgaben in den Vereinigten Staaten und im Afrika richtet. 
Kursteilnehmer, heraus die Frage, was zu stellen fordern sich 
die Fotographie in Verbindung steht?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les essais et les photos d'utilisations ont fourni
par des corps de paix que les volontaires aux étudiants d'aide 
créent un photomontage qui concentre l'attention sur les questions 
environnementales les Etats-Unis et Afrique. Des étudiants de 
poser la question, que la photographie se défient-elles 
communique-t-elle ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os essays e as fotos dos usos forneceram pelo 
corpo que de paz os voluntários aos estudantes da ajuda críam um 
photomontage que focalize a atenção em edições ambientais nos 
estados e na África unidos. Estudantes desafia-se fazer a 
pergunta, que a fotografia está comunicando-se?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i saggi e le foto di usi hanno fornito da Peace 
corpo che i volontari agli allievi di aiuto creano un photomontage 
che mette a fuoco l'attenzione sulle edizioni ambientali in unito 
Dichiara e l'Africa. Allievi si sfida a fare la domanda, 
che cosa la fotografia sta comunicando?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τα δοκίμια και οι φωτογραφίες χρήσεων που παρέχονται 
από την ειρήνη προσφέρονται εθελοντικά Σώμα να βοηθήσουν 
τους σπουδαστές να δημιουργήσουν ένα photomontage που στρέφει 
την προσοχή περιβαλλοντικά ζήτημα στις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες και την
Αφρική. Σπουδαστές προκαλείται για να υποβάλει την ερώτηση,
τι η φωτογραφία επικοινωνεί;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los ensayos y las fotos de las aplicaciones 
proporcionaron por el cuerpo de paz que los voluntarios a los 
estudiantes de la ayuda crean un photomontage que se centre la 
atención en ediciones ambientales en los Estados Unidos y la África.
¿Los estudiantes se desafía a hacer la pregunta, qué la 
fotografía se está comunicando?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103618</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/visual-messages-creating-a-photomontage</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
